attributes.action: create a more fair congestion charging system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im sorry, but £8 a day for someone who has to enter certain boroughs of London by car is a joke. over the past year and a half i have seen no improvement in congestion. The point had also been made that the congestion charge is there to encourage people to use public transport. how can you use public transport when you're a contractor or plumber? you cant take your tools or materials on the bus or underground! to me London is as congested as it was back 5 or 6 years. furthermore, if u want to take our money, please use it on a worthwhile cause. like improving road quality. or creating new roads to act as valves when roads get too busy.

rejection.details: Sorry, this is a matter for London's Mayor and Transport for London
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
